question.title: Cannot invoke "TemporalAccessor.getLong(TemporalField)" because "this.temporal" is null at ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger.info(Logger.java:584)
question.body:
Getting error at log.info("...") while running Tests in build pipeline

The error is being thrown only in the GitLab build pipeline tests phase, not in Local

Using:

  • lombok.extern.slf4j.@Slf4j

Upgrading to Spring Boot 3.5 and some other libraries:

  • org.springframework.boot-spring-boot-starter-parent -> from 3.4.4 to 3.5.3
  • spring-cloud.version -> 2025.0.0
  • software.amazon.version -> 2.31.77
  • org.json.json.version -> 20250517
  • jacoco-maven-plugin.version -> 0.8.13
  • commons-csv.version -> 1.14.0
  • com.oracle.database.jdbc -> from ojdbc8 to ojdbc17
  • Maybe some other from parent services, let me know if need to dig deeper on this.

Pipeline container log:

  • Java version: 17.0.15, vendor: Amazon.com Inc., runtime: /opt/java
  • Apache Maven 3.9.9 (8e8579a9e***260186937)
  • Maven home: /root/.m2/wrapper/dists/apache-maven-3.9.9/34***f1
  • Java version: 17.0.15, vendor: Amazon.com Inc., runtime: /opt/java
  • Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: ANSI_X3.4-1968
  • OS name: "linux", version: "5.10.238-231.953.amzn2.x86_64", arch: "amd64", family: "unix"

Exception stack trace:

2025-07-14T04:05:00.639470Z 01E java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor.getLong(java.time.temporal.TemporalField)" because "this.temporal" is null
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639478Z 01E     at java.base/java.time.format.DateTimePrintContext.getValue(DateTimePrintContext.java:308)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639480Z 01E     at java.base/java.time.format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder$NumberPrinterParser.format(DateTimeFormatterBuilder.java:2763)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639481Z 01E     at java.base/java.time.format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder$CompositePrinterParser.format(DateTimeFormatterBuilder.java:2402)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639483Z 01E     at java.base/java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.formatTo(DateTimeFormatter.java:1849)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639484Z 01E     at java.base/java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.format(DateTimeFormatter.java:1823)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639485Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.util.CachingDateFormatter.format(CachingDateFormatter.java:74)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639486Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.util.StatusPrinter2.buildStr(StatusPrinter2.java:180)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639487Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.util.StatusPrinter.buildStr(StatusPrinter.java:99)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639488Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.status.OnPrintStreamStatusListenerBase.print(OnPrintStreamStatusListenerBase.java:56)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639489Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.status.OnPrintStreamStatusListenerBase.addStatusEvent(OnPrintStreamStatusListenerBase.java:63)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639490Z 01E     at org.springframework.boot.logging.logback.SystemStatusListener.addStatusEvent(SystemStatusListener.java:71)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639492Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.BasicStatusManager.fireStatusAddEvent(BasicStatusManager.java:86)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639493Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.BasicStatusManager.add(BasicStatusManager.java:58)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639494Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAwareBase.addStatus(ContextAwareBase.java:80)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639495Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAwareBase.addError(ContextAwareBase.java:105)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639496Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.UnsynchronizedAppenderBase.doAppend(UnsynchronizedAppenderBase.java:89)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639497Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.core.spi.AppenderAttachableImpl.appendLoopOnAppenders(AppenderAttachableImpl.java:51)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639498Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger.appendLoopOnAppenders(Logger.java:272)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639499Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger.callAppenders(Logger.java:259)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639500Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger.buildLoggingEventAndAppend(Logger.java:426)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639501Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger.filterAndLog_0_Or3Plus(Logger.java:386)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639502Z 01E     at ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger.info(Logger.java:584)
2025-07-14T04:05:00.639503Z 01E     at com.myapp.services.MyService.doSomething(MyService.java:107)

MyService.java:107 is:

log.info("Updating... request ");

I tried commenting out the log.info line; it seems the error from that line disappears, and I get the same error in the next log.info. It's difficult to comment all log.info lines and see if it succeeds.

What could be the potential issue?

pom.xml (removed sensitive info, masked project-specific names, made bit generic):

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" 
         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 
                             http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">

    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>com.example</groupId>
    <artifactId>example-project</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <packaging>pom</packaging>

    <name>Example Project</name>
    <description>Example project description.</description>

    <parent>
        <groupId>com.example.commons</groupId>
        <artifactId>parent-pom</artifactId>
        <version>1.0.0</version>
        <relativePath/>
    </parent>

    <modules>
        <module>module-common</module>
        <module>module-controller</module>
        <module>module-service</module>
        <module>module-repo</module>
        <module>module-batch</module>
        <module>module-externaldto</module>
        <module>module-coverage</module>
        <module>module-jobs</module>
        <module>module-other</module>
    </modules>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <project.reporting.outputEncoding>UTF-8</project.reporting.outputEncoding>
        <java.version>17</java.version>
        <module-migration.version>1.1.54</module-migration.version>
        <module-commons.version>2.5.0</module-commons.version>
        <software.amazon.version>2.31.77</software.amazon.version>
        <org.json.json.version>20250517</org.json.json.version>
        <jacoco-maven-plugin.version>0.8.13</jacoco-maven-plugin.version>
        <maven-jar-plugin.version>3.4.2</maven-jar-plugin.version>
        <commons-csv.version>1.14.0</commons-csv.version>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.example.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-lib</artifactId>
            <version>${module-commons.version}</version>
            <exclusions>
                <exclusion>
                    <groupId>org.apache.poi</groupId>
                    <artifactId>poi</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>
                    <groupId>org.apache.poi</groupId>
                    <artifactId>poi-ooxml</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
            </exclusions>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.micrometer</groupId>
            <artifactId>micrometer-registry-prometheus</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
            <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
            <scope>provided</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
            <exclusions>
                <exclusion>
                    <groupId>com.vaadin.external.google</groupId>
                    <artifactId>android-json</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
            </exclusions>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.google.code.gson</groupId>
                <artifactId>gson</artifactId>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId>
                <artifactId>guava</artifactId>
                <version>33.4.7-jre</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
                <artifactId>commons-compress</artifactId>
                <version>1.27.1</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>software.amazon.awssdk</groupId>
                <artifactId>bom</artifactId>
                <version>${software.amazon.version}</version>
                <type>pom</type>
                <scope>import</scope>
            </dependency>
        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <configuration>
                    <systemPropertyVariables>
                        <org.slf4j.simpleLogger.defaultLogLevel>INFO</org.slf4j.simpleLogger.defaultLogLevel>
                        <org.slf4j.simpleLogger.showDateTime>true</org.slf4j.simpleLogger.showDateTime>
                    </systemPropertyVariables>
                    <forkCount>1</forkCount>
                    <reuseForks>true</reuseForks>
                    <runOrder>alphabetical</runOrder>
                    <excludes>
                        <exclude>**/*Seeder.java</exclude>
                    </excludes>
                    <argLine>@{argLine} -Duser.timezone=UTC -Xms1G -Xmx4G --add-exports java.base/sun.nio.ch=ALL-UNNAMED</argLine>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-checkstyle-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.6.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <configLocation>google_checks.xml</configLocation>
                    <sourceDirectories>
                        <sourceDirectory>src/main/java</sourceDirectory>
                    </sourceDirectories>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.sonarsource.scanner.maven</groupId>
                <artifactId>sonar-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0.3922</version>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${jacoco-maven-plugin.version}</version>
                <configuration>
                    <destFile>${sonar.jacoco.reportPath}</destFile>
                    <append>true</append>
                </configuration>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>agent</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <configuration>
                    <skip>true</skip>
                    <jvmArguments>--add-exports java.base/sun.nio.ch=ALL-UNNAMED</jvmArguments>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-deploy-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.0.0-M1</version>
                <configuration>
                    <skip>true</skip>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.sonatype.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>nexus-staging-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>1.7.0</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>default-deploy</id>
                        <phase>deploy</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>deploy</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
                <configuration>
                    <serverId>nexus-server-id</serverId>
                    <nexusUrl>https://example-nexus-repository-url/</nexusUrl>
                    <skipStaging>true</skipStaging>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.openrewrite.maven</groupId>
                <artifactId>rewrite-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>5.43.3</version>
                <configuration>
                    <exportDatatables>true</exportDatatables>
                    <activeRecipes>
                        <recipe>org.openrewrite.java.spring.boot3.UpgradeSpringBoot_3_3</recipe>
                    </activeRecipes>
                </configuration>
                <dependencies>
                    <dependency>
                        <groupId>org.openrewrite.recipe</groupId>
                        <artifactId>rewrite-spring</artifactId>
                        <version>5.22.0</version>
                    </dependency>
                </dependencies>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

    <distributionManagement>
        <snapshotRepository>
            <id>nexus-snapshots</id>
            <url>https://example-repository-url/snapshots/</url>
        </snapshotRepository>
        <repository>
            <id>nexus-releases</id>
            <url>https://example-repository-url/releases/</url>
        </repository>
    </distributionManagement>

    <profiles>
        <profile>
            <id>test-coverage</id>
            <build>
                <plugins>
                    <plugin>
                        <groupId>org.jacoco</groupId>
                        <artifactId>jacoco-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                        <version>${jacoco-maven-plugin.version}</version>
                        <executions>
                            <execution>
                                <id>prepare-unit-tests</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                            <execution>
                                <id>prepare-integration-tests</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>prepare-agent</goal>
                                </goals>
                                <phase>pre-integration-test</phase>
                                <configuration>
                                    <propertyName>itCoverageAgent</propertyName>
                                </configuration>
                            </execution>
                            <execution>
                                <id>jacoco-site</id>
                                <phase>verify</phase>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>report</goal>
                                </goals>
                            </execution>
                            <execution>
                                <id>jacoco-check</id>
                                <goals>
                                    <goal>check</goal>
                                </goals>
                                <configuration>
                                    <rules>
                                        <rule>
                                            <element>CLASS</element>
                                            <excludes>
                                                <!-- exclusions omitted -->
                                            </excludes>
                                            <limits>
                                                <limit>
                                                    <counter>LINE</counter>
                                                    <value>COVEREDRATIO</value>
                                                    <minimum>0.80</minimum>
                                                </limit>
                                            </limits>
                                        </rule>
                                    </rules>
                                </configuration>
                            </execution>
                        </executions>
                    </plugin>
                </plugins>
            </build>
        </profile>

        <profile>
            <id>sonar</id>
            <activation>
                <activeByDefault>true</activeByDefault>
            </activation>
            <properties>
                <sonar.host.url>https://example-sonarqube-url/</sonar.host.url>
                <sonar.java.coveragePlugin>jacoco</sonar.java.coveragePlugin>
                <sonar.dynamicAnalysis>reuseReports</sonar.dynamicAnalysis>
                <sonar.jacoco.reportPath>${project.basedir}/target/jacoco.exec</sonar.jacoco.reportPath>
            </properties>
        </profile>

        <profile>
            <id>build-all</id>
            <modules>
                <module>module-controller</module>
                <module>module-service</module>
                <module>module-repo</module>
                <module>module-batch</module>
                <module>module-externaldto</module>
                <module>module-common</module>
                <module>module-coverage</module>
                <module>module-jobs</module>
                <module>module-other</module>
            </modules>
        </profile>
    </profiles>

</project>

question_comments.body: The mocking will only work if the calling is the exact match of what you prescribed. If not the default is to return null. However I'm also in the camp that if you need to do static mocking you are doing things wrong (static methods are hard to test).

Hi, The issue was in specific tests, with this code: try (MockedStatic<ZonedDateTime> mockedZonedDateTime = mockStatic(ZonedDateTime.class)) { mockedZonedDateTime .when(() -> ZonedDateTime.now(ZoneId.of(FILE_DATA_ZONE_ID))) .thenReturn(mockedDateTime); ... } Due to this, somehow mocking of ZonedDateTime.now(...) making DateTimePrintContext > this.temporal null and hence NPE while log.info. As a solution, instead of mocking ZonedDateTime.now(...), I mocked the entire Util class, which uses this code: mockStatic(MyUtils.class))

The initial reaction would be to log for different versions of SLF4J jars (different API compared to the SLF4J-simple). If you use a framework/library and that consists of multiple parts, generally speaking mixing different versions of that is a bad idea (even if the difference is a minor or patch version). I suspect that there is some mixture here for SLF4J and/or Logback.
Hi @m-deinum, the result of mvn help:effective-pom is way too big. Could you help me understand the debug strategy, like what to look for? Thanks!

Could you run a mvn help:effective-pom and post the output? Looks like the issue comes from the use of the SLF4J simple logger as you have added org.slf4j.simpleLogger.showDateTime so you might want to check the actual version of that compared to the other SLF4J parts (the API). Those should match.

Don't describe the dependencies you think you have but instead post your pom.xml / build.gradle listing your dependencies. My guess either you are managing dependencies you shouldn't be managing (trying to outsmart the Spring Boot dependency management) or pulling in libraries that aren't compatible with your Spring (Boot) version. \
